subject: United States Politics and Government
Football
Retirement
Handicapped
lead_paragraph: The United States Senate Committee on Commerce, Science and Transportation announced that it would hold a hearing Sept. 18 to examine the compensation system for retired players in the N.F.L.
snippet: The United States Senate Committee on Commerce, Science and Transportation announced that it would hold a hearing Sept. 18 to examine the compensation system for retired players in the N.F.L.
